original: 小的在<color=#bceea7>$city1</color>助大人實行屯田，無奈遭遇旱澇天災，農事扣除<color=#bceea7>$num1</color>。
text: The small one helped the adults to implement farming in <color=#bceea7>$city1</color>, but they had no choice but to encounter droughts and floods and natural disasters, so they deducted <color=#bceea7>$num1</color> for farming.
